name: ImagingStudy
title: ImagingStudy
description: Representation of the content produced in a DICOM imaging study. A study comprises a set of series, each of which includes a set of Service-Object Pair Instances (SOP Instances - images or other data) acquired or produced in a common context.

elements.name: ImagingStudy
elements.description: Representation of the content produced in a DICOM imaging study.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifiers for the ImagingStudy such as DICOM Study Instance UID, and Accession Number.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the ImagingStudy.

elements.name: modality
elements.description: A list of all the series.modality values that are actual acquisition modalities, i.e. those in the DICOM Context Group 29 (value set OID 1.2.840.10008.6.1.19).

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The subject, typically a patient, of the imaging study.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The healthcare event (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this ImagingStudy is made.

elements.name: started
elements.description: Date and time the study started.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A list of the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

elements.name: referrer
elements.description: The requesting/referring physician.

elements.name: interpreter
elements.description: Who read the study and interpreted the images or other content.

elements.name: endpoint
elements.description: The network service providing access (e.g., query, view, or retrieval) for the study.

elements.name: numberOfSeries
elements.description: Number of Series in the Study.

elements.name: numberOfInstances
elements.description: Number of SOP Instances in Study.

elements.name: procedureReference
elements.description: The procedure which this ImagingStudy was part of.

elements.name: procedureCode
elements.description: The code for the performed procedure type.

elements.name: location
elements.description: The principal physical location where the ImagingStudy was performed.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Description of clinical condition indicating why the ImagingStudy was requested.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this Study.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Per the recommended DICOM mapping, this element is derived from the Study Description attribute (0008,1030).

elements.name: description
elements.description: The Imaging Manager description of the study.

elements.name: series
elements.description: Each study has one or more series of images or other content.
